Events.Haley-2: 50s/6 20/farmer 2 23 0 Haley 12 20 3/skippable/move farmer 0 -3 1 Haley -7 0 3/speak Haley "@? What are you doing here?"/quickQuestion #I came to visit you.#I came to see Emily.(break)speak Haley "Why, finally here for some fashion advice?"\questionAnswered cameToSeeHaley(break)speak Haley "Emily isn't going to give you the fashion advice you clearly need.$3"/move Haley -2 0 3/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/emote farmer 8/speak Haley "Your shirt and shoes don't match at all! Is this how all farmers are?"/quickQuestion #Honestly, I've never thought a lot about my outfits.#Stop insulting me! I know how to dress!(break)speak Haley "Great, you do understand you need help!$h"(break)friendship Haley -20\speak Haley "I'm just being brutally honest. Someone had to tell you!"/emote farmer 12/pause 500/fork cameToSeeHaley BarleyZP.EnemyOfTheValley_cameToSeeHaleySpeak/pause 1000/speak Haley "Anyway, I've got things to do. Have fun with Emily.$3"/faceDirection Haley 1/move Haley 7 0 3 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Events.Haley-2.Fork: speak Haley "So anyway, did you need something else from me?"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Events.Pierre-2: playful/5 21/farmer 6 27 0 Pierre 4 17 2/skippable/move farmer 0 -7 0/move farmer -2 0 3/move farmer 0 -1 0/speak Pierre "Hey, @. Here to do business again?#$b#You know, the townspeople have been saying I've got *quite* the green thumb.$1"/emote farmer 8/speak Pierre "Well, of course you know I resell what you sell me. That's just business.#$b#But, it appears our neighbors seem to think that it's me who grows all this!$1"/quickQuestion #Why would you lie like that?#Careful. You don't want to get on my bad side.(break)speak Pierre "Well, I'm not the one who's spreading the rumors!$1"(break)stopMusic\speak Pierre "What, do you think we're more than just business competitors?#$b#I'm not afraid of you.$3"\friendship Pierre -30/playMusic playful/speak Pierre "Anyway, let's not get too heated. Shall we get back to business?"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Events.Shane-2: Saloon1/17 21/farmer 14 23 0 Gus 10 18 2 Emily 15 17 0 Clint 19 23 3 Shane 21 17 2 Pam 7 18 1/skippable/animate Shane false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/pause 2000/emote Shane 12/move farmer 0 -2 0/move farmer 7 0 1/move farmer 0 -2 0/stopAnimation Shane/showFrame Shane 25/speak Shane "What do you want now? You keep bothering me for no reason. Leave me alone!$a"/showFrame Shane 0/quickQuestion #What are you talking about? I haven’t done anything!#You’ve been so rude to me since I got here, so I don’t know why you’re surprised.(break)speak Shane "Don’t play dumb with me! You never leave me alone!$a"(break)speak Shane "I don’t have to be all buddy-buddy with anyone if I don’t want to.$2#$b#Ever since you moved to Pelican Town, you've been making my life even harder than it already is.$a#$b#Not that I think you'd understand what it's like, anyway.$s"/textAboveHead Shane "*sigh*"/pause 2000/faceDirection Shane 3 true/speak Shane "Gus! I need another beer!"/faceDirection Gus 1 true/textAboveHead Gus "Another already?"/faceDirection Shane 2/pause 2000/speak Shane "Just stay out of my business, @.$2"/move Gus 8 0 1 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Events.Alex-2: jaunty/7 19/farmer -10 -10 0 Evelyn 3 17 1 Alex 5 17 3 George 6 22 0/skippable/animate Alex false true 200 16 17 18 19 20 21 22 22 22 22/pause 5000/speak Evelyn "Alex, what's the matter?"/stopAnimation Alex 22/showFrame Alex 23/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 0/faceDirection Alex 3/speak Alex "That darn new farmer has been messing with me!$5#$b#I don't know what their deal is!$5"/speak Evelyn "Well, you don't get along right now, but maybe you just need to give it some time.#$b#@ might be very nice once you get to know them!"/speak Alex "No way! They shouldn't be messing with me!"/pause 2000/warp farmer 9 23/playSound doorClose/speak Evelyn "Oh, someone's at the door!"/speak Alex "*sigh*... I'll get it.$s"/move Alex 0 2 2/move Alex 2 0 1 farmer 0 -4 3/waitForAllStationary/speak Alex "Oh, it's just you. What do you want?$a"/quickQuestion #Just stopping by!#I heard all that, you know.(break)friendship Alex -10\speak Alex "Hmph... whatever.$a"(break)friendship Alex -25\speak Alex "Yeah? Well, I don't know what your problem is, but stop messing with me!$a"/emote Alex 12/pause 1000/speak Alex "Anyway, whatever. Come inside, I guess...$s"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Events.Elliott-2: ocean/43 18/farmer 47 19 2 Elliott -10 -10 2/skippable/pause 2000/warp Elliott 49 11/playSound doorClose/faceDirection farmer 0/move Elliott 0 8 3 true/textAboveHead Elliott "Ah, hello."/waitForAllStationary/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Elliott "I think we may have gotten off on the wrong foot.#$b#Perhaps if we learned a bit about each other, we could come together."/pause 1000/emote Elliott 40/pause 2000/speak Elliott "I came to this valley to chisel away at my writing.#$b#I thought the peace and quiet here would inspire me."/pause 2000/speak Elliott "Everyone at home thought the idea was laughable, though...$s"/quickQuestion #I bet they're right.#Well, writing a novel is a lot of work...(break)friendship Elliott -30\speak Elliott "I see I was a fool to think you would understand.$a"(break)speak Elliott "This is true. But, I believe this novel will come to fruition one day, whether you have faith or not."/faceDirection Elliott 2/pause 2000/speak Elliott "Although I may seem a solitary person, the support of my community is important to me, @.#$b#If that's not your plan, I can certainly find that somewhere else.$a"/pause 3000/speak Elliott "Now, if you'll excuse me...$a"/move Elliott 0 -8 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Events.Elliott-4: Saloon1/9 20/Elliott 4 19 2 farmer 14 23 0 Gus 10 18 2 Emily 15 17 0 Clint 19 23 3 Pam 7 18 1/skippable/move farmer -9 0 3/move farmer 0 -3 0/speak Elliott "Ah, @. Remember our chat about my in-progress novel?#$b#I've finally found a title for it: How to Deal With Difficult People.$h"/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Elliott "Yes, I've found moving to Pelican Town gave me *quite* the inspiration for a book such as this one.$h#$b#I hope that others find it enlightening."/question null "#Now just what do you mean by that?#I think you're giving me a reason to need that book!"/speak Elliott "Oh, you truly are humorous!$h"/pause 1000/speak Elliott "I think I shall get a drink then.#$b#Perhaps I will see you around."/faceDirection Elliott 1/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
